input_email_body:
Subject: Issue Regarding Data Backup

Dear Support Team,

I am writing to inform you about a problem we are experiencing with our data backup system. The encryption process has suddenly failed, and we are unable to determine the source of the problem. We have restarted the servers, checked the logs, and reviewed the manuals, but the issue persists.

The error occurred unexpectedly, and we are concerned that it might be a software or configuration issue You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. We have reviewed the system settings and configurations, but everything seems to be in order.

We would appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue. Please let us know if there are any additional troubleshooting steps we should take or if you need further information from us.

Thank you for your swift support on this matter. We look forward to your response.

Best regards,
[Your Name] My name is Maria Gonzalez.
